page.title: 01ROUND AND ABOUT GRANTHAM
page.content: I caught the bus to Grantham bus station. My brother then went to the football ground. I walked to the Isaac Newton Shopping Centre and into Morrisons. I bought a few things. On my way to the opticians I passed the Guild Hall. The opticians was shut so I decided to go to A&A glazing. I ordered a sheet of glass for our front window. I went past the King school. It was empty because it was half term. I had to go and get a book from the Central school. Luckily there was a caretaker there who let me in. From there I took a footpath past Harrowby Mill along the river Witham to Union Street. I walked on to the Paragon and saw a film. After it finished I phoned a taxi to take me home. We went past the leisure centre and I wished that I could go in the swimming pool. I was soon back home.
